text: Ki tusim isa gala tom dara ga'e ki tuhanu apani'am rahasama'i galam tom pahilam dana dena pavega. Tam jekara tusim ajiha na karo tam alaha ne tuhanu mu'afa kara dita ate tusim namaza sathapita karom ate zakata ada karo. Ate alaha ate usa de rasula di agi'a da palana karo ate jo kujha tusim karade ho alaha usa tom janu hai
